column4: hey guys can anyone recommend a good program for ubuntu which lets you create a video slideshow from pictures, i tried googling and cant find much that really does the trick
: I use this  http://tobyinkster.co.uk/blog/2008/01/06/dhyana/ using nautilus scripts
: oh, sry, u ment pictures, this is for video
: sry, exact opposite - video to picture preview
